title: Ticket #2333: Remove hard links across directories in release
description:
In the release tarball, we hard-link 'the tool' between all of its incarnations across the bin and sbin directories. AFS doesn't support hard linking across multiple directories. As a result, if you untar Condor into a directory on AFS, some of the tools end up missing.

The solution is to have two copies of 'the tool', one in bin and one in sbin, with same-directory hard-links.
